DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare short-term outcome CPAP Adjustable thermoplastic oral appliance treatment obstructive sleep apnea . Study design randomize cross-over trial 6-week period treatment 50 patient . Primary outcome quality life , degree sleepiness , severity OSA determine FOSQ ESS , AHI RDI , respectively . Wash-in period 2 week Wash-out period 2 week require start treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . OSA patient age 18 YO Siriraj hospital 2 . AHI 5 30 events/ h AHI > 30 events/h low O2 saturation > 70 % 3 . Positive consent form 1 . Patients severe Temporomandibular joint disease limit mandible advancement ( < 5 mm ) 2 . Patients severe periodontal disease inadequate teeth ( < 3 teeth quadrant ) 3 . Patients unstable medical problem i.e . poorly control cardiovascular disease , COPD , cancer , cerebrovascular disease , epilepsy , dementia , etc . 4 . Patients could tolerate side effect CPAP SMG 5 . Patients could followup finish protocol withdraw study reason .
